commitMessage:
@@@[FLINK-5967] Add support for AggregatingState in user functions

This also adds documentation for Aggregating state in user functions.

@@@[FLINK-16316][operators] Cut dependency between StreamingRuntimeContext and AbstractStreamOperator

This simplifies dependencies between those two classes and will allow for StreamingRuntimeContext
to be re-used in new replacement for AbstractStreamOperator.
